Description: Verify user can login successfully after entering correct username and password
Steps:
1. Enter valid username "john" on username field
2. Enter valid password "1234" on password field
3. Click on Login button
Expected Result: User should see a success message "You're logged in"

Description: Verify user cannot login successfully with incorrect username and password
Steps:
1. Enter valid username "john" on username field
2. Enter valid password "1234" on password field
3. Click on Login button
Expected Result: User should see an error message "Username or password is incorrect"
